ul.li: Finally, Turtle defines a shortcut expression for the built-in RDF predicate rdf:type.
In Turtle, we can use the word a instead of rdf:type.
That way, it reads almost like an English sentence: <alicia> a foaf:Person.

p.note: rdf:type is an important predicate because it allows us to say what kind of thing an entity is (what class of things it belongs to).
